title: Protesters demand removal of Mississippi flag from Philadelphia street
description: Philadelphia is displaying all 50 state flags – as well as those of U.S. territories and the District of Columbia – on city streets. But protesters demanded the removal of the Mississippi flag on July 21, saying it was offensive because it includes imagery from the Confederate flag.

title: The Washington Post's 2016 Top Workplaces
